London

22 Aug 2018 - Ted Doe

London is the capital of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland and the financial center of the world.

Together with New York and Hong Kong, it is called "port of Newlon". London is the political, economic, cultural and financial center of Britain, and the city with the largest number of museums, libraries and stadiums in the world. London is a leading world-class city in the world. It is one of the richest, most developed, most prosperous commercial and highest living standards cities in the world. It influences the whole world in politics, economy, culture, education, science and technology, finance, commerce, sports, media, fashion and so on. It is a model of globalization.
